file_content.text: Thanks for your help. You'll always have friends in Jiguuna!
Look at you. You found that idiot's spice shipment, didn't you? No, don't answer me. Least I know, the better. Spice is spice, right?
This should more than make up for your time and effort. You've done us a great service.
Where the hell is that shipment? I can't wait around forever.
